title: Best of The Herd: 10/28/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 10/28/2019
description:
Even after a big win over the Chiefs, Colin is concerned about the Packers moving forward and explains why. He thinks Browns fans are about to get really loud and wants them to remember how bad they are at the halfway point of the season. He admits where he was right and wrong over the weekend. Plus, Super Bowl Champion QB Trent Dilfer talks about the Bears needing to trade for a QB right now and why one NFL team has the next Tony Romo.



Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
